jd: From: shrasti singh, vyzeinc shrasti@vyzeinc.com Reply to: shrasti@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Job Title: Project ManagerLocation: RemoteDuration: Till March 1, 2025Job ID: 29778-1MOI - Skype Note -(need banking experience)The assignment is till March 1, 2025Part-time 20 hours a weekRemote Position Essential Duties & ResponsibilitiesIn-depth knowledge and understanding of US and Canada Payroll Taxes and year end filingsSupply subject matter expertise in how US/Canada HR/Payroll legislation related to payroll tax is set up, calculated, and reported in WorkdayProvide in-depth functional knowledge of large-scale ERP applications (preferrable Workday) across multiple releases to support payroll tax calculationsWork closely with the Payroll, Tax and Workday support team to manage year end for US and Canada ensuring all tax forms (W2s and P60s) are delivered on time and with accuracyDevelop and ensure execution of a highly detailed year end project plan including tax filings with a third party vendor and preparation of the next payroll year.Work with team to ensure high quality deliverables - assist team with test strategies, review test plansConduct appropriate audits on Third Party vendor to ensure accuracyAssist with or produce colleague communicationsCommunicate effectively across various teamsBe committed to excellence and high-quality standardsEducationUndergraduate degree or equivalent experienceFPC, CPA, Certified Payroll Professional, or equivalentExperienceExperience (5+ years) as project manager/subject matter expert of US and Canada tax year end.In depth understanding of end of year payroll tax filing and steps necessary to ensure that employee’s tax forms are 100% accurate.SkillsProficient in developing and leading a team to execute end to end detailed project plansExperience preferred in the support of US and Canada HR/Payroll operationsStrong analytical skillsStrong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to work well with other groups within the delivery organizationGood English, conversational and writtenTeam player
